snippet.title: Gloomy Juncture - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Gloomy Juncture is a neo-noir psychological thriller with a unique style that combines classic point-and-click adventure gameplay, a unique hand-drawn 3D world, and cutting-edge technology. 
A single gunshot echoes, triggering the wheels of fate. Embark on Gloomy Juncture's haunting tale, explore detailed settings, solve gripping enigmas, and unravel the fate of a mundane person on the edge of a peculiar world.

🔗 WISHLIST: https://steam.gloomyjuncture.com/
🔗 https://gloomyjuncture.com/

🔗 https://twitter.com/SubtalesStudio
🔗 https://www.instagram.com/filipe_subtales.studio/
🔗 https://www.reddit.com/user/SubOathshot

00:00 Preamble
00:16 The Dawn of Day
00:49 The Garden of Eden with the Fall of Man
01:00 Bolgia
01:18 CODA - Wishlist on Steam

---
